sentence.Network_en: She felt nervous, increasingly lacking in confidence about herself.
sentence.Network_cn: 她感到紧张，对自己越来越没有信心。

sentence.Network_en: Lacking self-confidence and maturity, many teenagers are left feeling very vulnerable.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多十几岁的孩子既缺乏自信又不够懂事，所以感情上十分脆弱。

sentence.Network_en: Lacking sovereignty, they could organise no defence against their oppressors.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有主权他们就无法组织起来反抗压迫者。

entry.def: If something or someone is lacking in a particular quality, they do not have any of it or enough of it.

example.ex: ...if your hair is lacking in lustre and feeling dry...
example.tran: 如果头发缺少光泽且干枯

example.ex: She felt nervous, increasingly lacking in confidence about herself...
example.tran: 她感到紧张，对自己越来越没有信心。

sentences.sentence: "character development is missing from the book"

auth_sentence.content: Lacking deeds, he must make do with words.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lacking deeds, he must make do with words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lacking deeds, he must make do with words.

auth_sentence.content: In dimension three, such a list was lacking.

auth_sentence.content: But no one can accuse him of lacking character.
